data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Caliente.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a throw-in for San Luis, close to Tijuana de Caliente's area.
In the minute 2, San Luis to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Tijuana de Caliente are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 4, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in San Luis's half.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Ariel Nahuelpan (Tijuana de Caliente) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 9, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Tijuana de Caliente are whistled for offside.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 13, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Free kick Tijuana de Caliente.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
In the minute 16, San Luis needs to be cautious. Tijuana de Caliente have an attacking throw-in.
Tijuana de Caliente's Ariel Nahuelpan misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of San Luis.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards San Luis a goal kick.
Miller Bolanos gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 21, Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the home team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Goal! Nicolas Ibanez gives San Luis a 0-1 lead in Tijuana.
Matias Catalan with an assist there.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 28, In Tijuana Tijuana de Caliente drive forward through Miller Bolanos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente close to the penalty box.
In the minute 30, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in San Luis.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of San Luis.
Tijuana de Caliente are coming forward and Miller Bolanos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tijuana.
In the minute 36, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
San Luis's Rodrigo Noya has been booked in Tijuana.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
In the minute 38, Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 40, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in San Luis's half.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of San Luis.
Free kick Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 42, Jorge Sanchez is booked for the away team.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of San Luis.
Matias Catalan (San Luis) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to San Luis.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Tijuana.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a San Luis throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
San Luis make their second substitution with Luis Leon replacing Jorge Sanchez.
Can Tijuana de Caliente capitalize from this throw-in deep inside San Luis's half?
In the minute 47, Throw-in high up the field for Tijuana de Caliente in Tijuana.
In the minute 47, The home team have replaced Jordi Cortizo with Bryan Angulo. This is the first substitution made today by Pablo Guede.
Dionicio Escalante is replacing Ventura Alvarado for San Luis at Estadio Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Jorge Aguilar (Tijuana de Caliente) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 49, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nicolas Ibanez of San Luis smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to San Luis.
Goal! Ramiro Gonzalez extends San Luis's lead to 0-2 in Tijuana with a header.
Great play from Dionicio Escalante to set up the goal.
In the minute 52, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to San Luis.
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick San Luis.
San Luis drives forward and German Berterame gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of San Luis.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Edgar Lopez is on a sub for Ariel Nahuelpan for Tijuana de Caliente.
Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Pablo Guede is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Caliente with Gerson Vazquez replacing Mauro Lainez.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 61, Tijuana de Caliente are pushing forward but Miller Bolanos's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio Caliente.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for San Luis at Estadio Caliente.
Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 66, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Edgar Lopez is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Edgar Lopez is back on his feet again.
Edgar Lopez of Tijuana de Caliente gets in a strike, but is off target.
San Luis have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Free kick San Luis.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Dionicio Escalante (San Luis) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tijuana.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
The home team replace Luis Gamiz with Clifford Aboagye.
In the minute 73, Marcel Ruiz (Tijuana de Caliente) has received a yellow card from Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
In Tijuana, Mauro Quiroga of San Luis is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 75, Nicolas Ibanez of San Luis gets in a strike, but is off target.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 77, San Luis to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Diego Pineda is replacing German Berterame for the away team.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to San Luis.
In the minute 81, The home team replace Jorge Aguilar with Aldo Cruz.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 82, Ramiro Gonzalez (San Luis) gets a yellow card.
Guillermo Vazquez (San Luis) is making a fourth substitution, with Juan Castro replacing Matias Catalan.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
In the minute 84, Bryan Angulo (Tijuana de Caliente) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of San Luis.
Marcel Ruiz (Tijuana de Caliente) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 87, Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
San Luis make their fifth substitution with Pablo Barrera replacing Mauro Quiroga.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
San Luis to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
San Luis have a dangerous throw-in.
San Luis have a dangerous throw-in.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Marcel Ruiz (Tijuana de Caliente) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio Caliente.
It's 0-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
